parameter.name: config_2
parameter.label: 2: Automatic switch off
parameter.description: If not zero, automatically switch off after a user defined time

parameter.name: config_3
parameter.label: 3: Function of RF off command
parameter.description: Defines how to interpret RF Off command. Can be used in conjunction with Auto Off function: Ignore - to switch on the light by motion detectors and switch it off after some amount of time: in case of multiple motion detectors each would try to switch the light off that would break logics; Switch on - to switch on the light on both On and Off paddle press on the remote and switch it off after some amount of time. Button off click will still work (if button operations are not disabled).

options.option: Switch on if load is off else switch off

parameter.name: config_4
parameter.label: 4: Switch on dimming by buttons
parameter.description: Defines if the switch should change it state to on/off if it is dimmed by buttons

parameter.name: config_5
parameter.label: 5: Switch on dimming by buttons
parameter.description: Defines if the switch should restore switch state to the last state prior to device power off (power cycle).

parameter.name: config_10
parameter.label: 10: Typical click timeout
parameter.description:
Typical time used to differentiate click, hold, double and triple clicks
Defined in 10ms ticks.

parameter.name: config_12
parameter.label: 12: Switch by buttons
parameter.description: If disabled, the local operations by buttons will not switch the load, but only send commands to On/Off association group. In this mode buttons are not linked with the switch anymore. They can be used separately: buttons to control remote device, switch will operate by RF commands only.

parameter.name: config_13
parameter.label: 13: Action on button single press or hold
parameter.description: Defines which command should be sent on button single press or hold. Basic commands are sent to Association group. Switch All commands are sent broadcast.

options.option: Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel) (Default)
Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set

parameter.name: config_14
parameter.label: 14: Action on button double press or hold
parameter.description: Defines which command should be sent on button double press or press-hold. Basic commands are sent to Association group. Switch All commands are sent broadcast. If not disabled, the device will wait for a click timeout to see if the second click would be pressed. This will introduce a small delay for single click commands.

options.option: Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel)
Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set

parameter.name: config_15
parameter.label: 15: Send the following switch all commands

parameter.name: config_16
parameter.label: 16: What to do on button Down press

options.option: Switch On if load is Off, else switch Off

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: Group 1
parameter.description: Single press and hold of up/down buttons

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: Group 2
parameter.description: Double press and press-hold of up/down buttons

parameter.name: group_3
parameter.label: Group 3
parameter.description: Send Reports on switch state change
